title: `rustc` seems to panic when looking up type info for a compiler error.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
`rustc` seems to panic when looking up type info for a compiler error. This does not happen with 01.12.2021 nightly. ### Code I unfortunately can't really show that because it's huge ... and not public atm. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (f8abed9ed 2021-12-26) binary: rustc commit-hash: f8abed9ed48bace6be0087bcd44ed534e239b8d8 commit-date: 2021-12-26 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.59.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 448 but the index is 448', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:712:18 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-nightly (f8abed9ed 2021-12-26) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [type_of] computing type of `components::button::Properties::href` #1 [inferred_outlives_crate] computing the inferred outlives predicates for items in this crate end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 448 but the index is 448', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:712:18 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/f8abed9ed48bace6be0087bcd44ed534e239b8d8/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/f8abed9ed48bace6be0087bcd44ed534e239b8d8/library/core/src/panicking.rs:107:14 2: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check at /rustc/f8abed9ed48bace6be0087bcd44ed534e239b8d8/library/core/src/panicking.rs:75:5 3: >::decode 4: >::decode 5: ::read_seq::, as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode::{closure#0}> 6: >::decode 7: >::decode 8: <&rustc_middle::ty::TyS as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode 9: as rustc_middle::ty::context::InternIteratorElement>>::intern_with::, <&rustc_middle::ty::list::List as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode::{closure#0}>, ::mk_substs, <&rustc_middle::ty::list::List as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode::{closure#0}>>::{closure#0}> 10: >::decode 11: <&rustc_middle::ty::TyS as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode 12: <&rustc_middle::ty::TyS as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode 13: ::try_load_query_result::<&rustc_middle::ty::TyS> 14: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory:: 15: ::type_of 16: ::visit_item 17: ::visit_all_item_likes:: 18: rustc_typeck::outlives::inferred_outlives_crate 19: ::with_deps::<>::with_task_impl::{closure#0}, rustc_middle::ty::CratePredicatesMap> 20: >::with_task:: 21: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(rustc_middle::ty::CratePredicatesMap, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job::{closure#3}> 22: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 23: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query:: 24: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::inferred_outlives_crate::force_from_dep_node 25: ::try_force_from_dep_node 26: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 27: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 28: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 29: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 30: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::ensure_must_run:: 31: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 32: ::for_each_module:: 33: ::track_errors:: 34: rustc_typeck::check_crate 35: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 36: >::with_task::> 37: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job>::{closure#3}> 38: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 39: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 40: ::enter::> 41: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 42: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 43: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 44: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> ```
